reviews.review_text: I've taken 5 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the session structure from Module 5. Now charging $253 per session vs $78 before. Game changer.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 99% in 3 months. Worth every penny.

I've taken 8 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had filled my calendar. The community support was incredible too.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the consultation funnel and saw 65% revenue increase in 6 weeks. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 5 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
Loved the practice sessions. Being able to discuss scope of practice with peers who 'get it' was invaluable. The form library is something I still reference weekly. Great ongoing value.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the assessment forms templates alone saved me 31 hours of work. Closed 8 new clients in 3 months using the pitch framework from Module 5. Already made back 2x my investment.

I've taken 11 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from traditional therapy to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 8 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The goal-setting framework was excellent, but advanced techniques could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 8 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Finally, a certification that respects your intelligence. The research foundation section gave me the conceptual foundation I was missing from my undergraduate studies. Now I can confidently explain neurobiology to clients and colleagues.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on group coaching. The Module 3 module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.

I've taken 6 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

The instructor support was exceptional. the instructor personally answered my question about intake procedures within 24 hours. The peer discussion forum helped me troubleshoot real client scenarios. Never felt alone in the learning process.

I've taken 15 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on session structure helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied progress tracker with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 40% in 3 months. Worth every penny.

As someone with a background in social work, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of person-centered and narrative therapy approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.
